starter-theme-description: A theme made by professional designers to showcase your content with a delightful experience. It includes featured images & categories.
pro-theme-description: Take your App to the next level. Customise every detail of your app, display pages and give your users a best-in-class experience.
caroussel-theme-description: Let your images be the most important part of your App. Your users will navigate through your content guided by the featured image of your posts.
